mutants.code:
def remove_extremes(input_string):
    numbers = input_string.split('')
    numbers = [int(num) for num in numbers]
    numbers.sort()
    numbers = numbers[2:-2]
    numbers = [str(num) for num in numbers]
    return ', '.join(numbers)

def remove_extremes(input_string):
    numbers = input_string.split(', ')
    numbers = [int(num) for num in numbers]
    numbers.sort()
    numbers = numbers[3:-2]
    numbers = [str(num) for num in numbers]
    return ', '.join(numbers)
